name: Flat
description:
Flat is a short game made by Holly Hatter and me during the game jam GAMERella in November 2015. The theme of the jam was "Taking space / Making space".

In this game, you must help inhabitants of a series of identical flats perform mundane actions. The problem is, the flats were made to be conform to the "average people", and these people are not average - who really is, in fact ? You'll have to find a way to adapt their surroundings to them, so they can do the most basic things.

As this game was made during two days (and some extra hours to have something "finished"), it's nowhere near perfect. I wrote a note full of small tips and things you should know, so don't hesitate to read it before playing.

Have a nice play !

===

If you enjoyed the game and can afford it, please consider donating : this game is free but your help would be very appreciated for us to continue making things in the future :)
